<title level="1" right="Focus 5" pfs="Standard">[Celestial Brand](/Spells.aspx?ID=497)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Curse" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=38" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=148" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 403 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Bloodline**
[Angelic](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=2)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Single Action" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

**Target** 1 evil creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 round
</row>

</column>

---

A blazing symbol appears on the target, cursing it to face divine justice. You and your allies receive a +1 status bonus to your attack rolls and skill checks against it. Anytime a good creature damages it, the good creature deals an additional 1d4 good damage. The target is then temporarily immune for 1 minute.

---
**Heightened (+2)** The good damage increases by 1.
name: Celestial Brand
